game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the depths of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost city deep in the heart of the mystical forest, where an ancient scroll holds the secrets of the long-lost civilization. Brave adventurers are needed to retrieve this scroll and unlock its secrets.
game.reward: Golden Chalice of Eldarath, 1000 gold pieces

task.objective: Gather information about the lost city from local villagers
task.description: Speak to the villagers in Oakwood Village and gather any information they may have about Eldarath. Look for clues, rumors, or hints that might aid you on your quest.

task.objective: Navigate the treacherous paths to reach the entrance of Eldarath
task.description: Use your wits and bravery to navigate the winding paths and hidden dangers that guard the entrance to Eldarath. Be prepared for unexpected challenges.

task.objective: Raid the ancient temple and retrieve the scroll
task.description: Cautiously explore the ruins of Eldarath, avoiding deadly traps and battling fearsome creatures. Reach the heart of the temple to claim the ancient scroll.
